column3: Awargyaa nwoma a medze gyaa hom na awar no wɔ henfa? Anaa m'adzefirfo mu woana na matɔn hom ama no? Hwɛ
column4: hom emumuyɛ ntsi na wɔtɔɔn hom
column5: na hom mbrato ntsi na wogyaa hom na awar."

column4: obi nnyi hɔ a ɔgye do? Aso me nsa yɛ tsia
column5: ma onnkotum apon? Anaa minnyi tum a wɔdze gye nkwa? Hwɛ
column8: mema nsutsen dandan sar: hɔn mu nam bombɔn

column3: na medze eyitam ayɛ hɔn nkataenyi."

column2: "EWURADZE Nyankopɔn ama me hɔn a wɔakyerɛkyerɛ hɔn no hɔn tɛkyerɛma
column3: ma meehu mbrɛ medze nsɛm bɔwowaw nyia ɔaberɛ: onyan anapa anapa
column4: onyan m'aso ma maatse asɛm dɛ hɔn a wɔakyerɛkyerɛ hɔn."

column3: na medze m'afon memaa hɔn a wotutu nhwi: mennhuntsa m'enyim emmfi fɛr na ntafi ho."

column2: "Na EWURADZE Nyankopɔn bɔboa me; dɛm ntsi na m'enyim nngu ase yi: dɛm ntsi na mepirim m'enyim dɛ ɔtwerɛbo yi
column3: na minyim dɛ m'enyim runngu ase."
ɔbɛn; woana na ɔnye me bedzi esi? Wɔmma yɛmbɔ mu ngyina: woana na ɔyɛ me tamfo? Ma ɔntwe mpin me."
EWURADZE Nyankopɔn bɔboa me; woana nye nyia obobu me fɔ? Hwɛ
column4: hɔn nyinara bosuw dɛ atar; nkakraka bɔwe hɔn."

column2: "Woana wɔ hom mu a osuro EWURADZE
column3: na otsie n'akowaa ne ndze? Nyia ɔnantsew sum mu
column5: ma ɔmfa no werɛ nhyɛ EWURADZE ne dzin mu

column4: hom dze ngyantsia yeyɛ abɔdo nyinara: hom nnantsew hom gya ne framee
column5: ɔnye ngyantsia a hom asosɔ no mu. Iyi na hom benya no wɔ me nsamu; hom bɛdeda hɔ awerɛhow mu."
